name: mountainy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having a lot of mountains: The company headquarters was in a mountainy area. She asked for a mountainy location, and this hotel would be a great choice.
relating to, like, or living in mountains: A group of mountainy men was standing at the bar.
More examplesFewer examplesI'd enjoy a seaside holiday, but a mountainy option would be good too.It was rocky, mountainy land that was difficult to farm.The mountainy drives in this area are quite frightening if you're not used to them.These animals only live in the mountainy areas.The man was dressed in the hat and coarse clothes of a mountainy farmer.
